body_html:
Can any of you reproduce this in a docker image? That would be helpful for debugging.

A stack trace of the segfault would be great as well; if you do something like

gdb python
> run crash.py

and then type "backtrace" when it crashes.
body_text:
Can any of you reproduce this in a docker image? That would be helpful for debugging.
A stack trace of the segfault would be great as well; if you do something like
gdb python
> run crash.py

and then type "backtrace" when it crashes.
body:
Can any of you reproduce this in a docker image? That would be helpful for debugging.

A stack trace of the segfault would be great as well; if you do something like
```
gdb python
> run crash.py
```
and then type "backtrace" when it crashes.
